CustomField.description: Formula which calculates Total Margin for Opp based on Primary Quote Margin Amount in $ is not as important as Margin %, as Margin % is more easily defined as Standard KPI
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Formula which calculates Total Margin for Opp based on Primary Quote Margin Amount in $ is not as important as Margin %, as Margin % is more easily defined as Standard KPI
CustomField.label: Margin %
